backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister defining access control, admin session logic, and data types for books, notes, blogs, users, ratings, comments, and forum content.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing type definitions and structures for transitioning stored actor state between versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated admin sign‑in UX feature with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file summarizing major frontend components, pages, styles, and hooks across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining color tokens and dark‑mode equivalents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React routing setup using TanStack Router with global layout, theme provider, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Empty placeholder file for admin notifications component.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignInPanel: Admin sign‑in form handling II login, admin credential submission, and detailed error classification.
frontend/src/components/BookComments.tsx: Handles displaying, posting, and liking book comments with validation, loading states, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/BookRating.tsx: Displays average ratings and lets users submit a rating while preventing duplicate ratings.
Admin panel for adding, editing, deleting, and uploading book files and covers with drag‑and‑drop, previews, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with branding and Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides navigation, site logo display, and login/logout handling with mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredMod: Modal prompting users to log in or complete their profile before accessing restricted content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a profile completion prompt for authenticated users lacking required profile info.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user avatar from a profile image or fallback initial with size options.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeMessageMo: Modal component showing a welcome message with book-themed visuals and a button to close.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin auth, and various backend interactions such as uploads and asset fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark theme variables and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring React Query and Internet Identity providers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying author photo, description, and Instagram link using site assets when available.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page handling admin auth, file uploads, site asset management, and drag‑and‑drop interactions.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts with preview images or file-type icons, loading state, and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder message for unavailable blog posts and provides navigation back to the blog or home.
frontend/src/pages/BookReaderPage.tsx: Fetches and displays book files with PDF/Word viewer support, handling authentication, loading states, and profile requirements.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterNoteViewerPa: Loads and displays character note files (image, video, PDF) with authentication checks and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Lists forum threads, allows creating threads and posting replies with authentication and profile validation.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPostPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder page for unavailable forum posts with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing featured books, character notes, and blog posts with authentication checks for accessing protected content.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editor that loads user data, validates fields, handles profile picture upload, and saves updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin settings panel supporting asset uploads and CRUD operations for books, blogs, notes, and new-coming items.
frontend/src/pages/SuggestionsPage.tsx: User suggestion form allowing authenticated users to submit ideas with simulated backend submission.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utility functions for normalizing backend errors, classifying admin login failures, and validating file uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theming (colors, typography, animations), and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including known issues and pending feature requests focused on fixing and improving admin authentication.
